title: Amber Liu breaks silence on new music after f(x) Sulli death
text:
Amber is coming back with new music (Picture: Michael Tullberg/Getty Images)

Amber Liu has updated fans on her upcoming music following the death of her former bandmate Sulli.

The 27-year-old postponed her activities earlier this month after Sulli – who was in f(x) with Amber, Victoria, Luna and Krystal from 2009 until 2015 – died aged 25 in an apparent suicide.

However, Amber has now assured fans that she will still be releasing new music in November.

The Countdown singer wrote on Instagram: ‘Hi everyone, I just wanted to apologise for the delay and any confusion I may have caused recently through my socials.

‘I will still be going on tour for Tour X early next year and my next single “Other People” on the X album is releasing the first week of November.

‘Thank you so much for your patience, understanding and words of encouragement. I hope to see you all soon!’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Fans and friends left strings of heart emojis under the post, while one fan wrote: ‘Take as much time as you need off Amber. We love you and will always be here for you.’

Sulli is suspected to have taken her own life (Picture: EPA/YONHAP)

Amber’s last post came on 14 October – hours before Sulli was found dead – teasing the release of her new single Other People.

The short clip saw the star gazing at a picture of her with her love interest on a screen – before she knocks over the iPad.

However, hours later, following the tragic news of Sulli’s passing, Amber spoke out to suspend her activities.

She wrote on her Instagram story: ‘Due to recent events I’ll be putting on hold my upcoming activities. Sorry everyone. Thank you for your thoughts.’

Sulli was buried in a private funeral earlier this month, with a preliminary autopsy ruling out homicide.

Need support? Contact the Samaritans For emotional support you can call the Samaritans 24-hour helpline on 116 123, email jo@samaritans.org, visit a Samaritans branch in person or go to the Samaritans website.

description: Amber Liu will be releasing her new single Other People after the death of her former f(x) bandmate Sulli.
